hopsin: yo never had a family to turn to bag of weed to burn through so me gettin famous this shit i actually deserve to horrific nightmares with fantasies to serve you act like a psycho i got the nerve to how come its always about bitches and talking about riches and walking it out this is me chalkin em out witness provocative sounds disses im tossin around mission is knocking em down this shit is causing the drought isnt it boggling how one nigga can be so dope but never get promoted answer that cause he dont know and hes so broke that he cant even eat no mo behind on all of his bills because his cheese dont grow my life is usually harsh i got a bruise on my heart thats why my music is dark i gotta do it its part of this reason that i was put on this planet we call earth hopefully in the end i see what it was all worth
